title: University Sports Committee Election 2024
description: Election for university sports committee representatives

candidates.name: Gervin Dela Cueva
candidates.bio: 4th year Computer Science student with experience in sports analytics and team management systems.
candidates.goals: Modernize sports facilities with technology, create digital tracking systems for athlete performance, and improve sports equipment management.

candidates.name: Jericho Galace
candidates.bio: 3rd year Business Administration student and former varsity basketball player.
candidates.goals: Improve sports facilities, organize more inter-university competitions, and create better support systems for student athletes.

candidates.name: Daniel Serrano
candidates.bio: 2nd year Computer Engineering student interested in sports technology and fitness tracking.
candidates.goals: Integrate fitness tracking technology, develop sports apps for students, and create virtual reality training programs for athletes.

candidates.name: Mar James Delimios
candidates.bio: 3rd year Mechanical Engineering student with experience in sports equipment design.
candidates.goals: Design and improve sports equipment, create sustainable sports facilities, and develop innovative training equipment for various sports.
